alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 9:33AM CDT until May 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at New Boston LD17 affecting Louisa and Mercer Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River at Keithsburg affecting Des Moines, Mercer, Henderson and Louisa Counties. Mississippi River at Muscatine affecting Rock Island, Louisa, Mercer and Muscatine Counties. Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Hancock, Lee, Des Moines and Henderson Counties. Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Des Moines and Henderson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Muscatine. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water affects the lower portion of the Riverside Park parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 13.6 feet by May 27th. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
